subject: Nutrition
title: Insect Protein
description: Learn Insect Protein in one minute.

hook.text: Two billion people eat insects regularly. The Western world is the exception, not the norm.

buildup.text: Crickets produce the same protein as cattle using 12 times less feed and 2,000 times less water.

discovery.text: Insect farming emits 80% fewer greenhouse gases than livestock and requires a fraction of the land.

twist.text: The biggest barrier isn't nutrition or sustainabilityâ€”it's Western psychological disgust about eating bugs.

climax.text: Companies bypass disgust by grinding insects into powder for protein bars, pasta, and baked goods.

punchline.text: Insects are the most efficient protein. Only our minds resist.

quiz.question: How many people worldwide already eat insects?
